abstract: In this paper, we investigate the new graph characteristic, the edge irregularity strength, denoted as es, as a modification of the well known irregularity strength, total edge irregularity strength and total vertex irregularity strength. As a result, we obtain the exact value of an edge irregularity strength of corona product of cycle with isolated vertices.
meta: July 2016AKCE International Journal of Graphs and Combinatorics 13(3)
